definition: variant of 夭[yao1]/to die young/to die prematurely/Taiwan pr. [yao3]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
Jobs (name)/see also 史蒂夫·喬布斯|史蒂夫·乔布斯[Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1], Steve Jobs
Gorbachev/Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995
to dress up in disguise (idiom); to pretend for the purpose of deceit
Qiao Hong (1968-), former PRC female table tennis player

sentences.english: Old black Joe still pickin ' cotton.
sentences.chinese: 老黑人乔仍然在摘棉花。

sentences.english: "Is the book in artistic binding?" asked Joe.
The hawkish Cho believed the Separatists had attacked Glid Station.
sentences.chinese: 强硬的乔相信格利德站遭到了分裂分子的进攻。

sentences.english: Mrs. Chambers sits comfortably in her  armchair, enjoying a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔柏斯太太舒服地坐在扶手椅里，享受着一杯咖啡。
我是乔热血沸腾的愤怒。

sentences.english: Joe is thirsty.Pass him a drink.
sentences.chinese: 乔看起来很渴，请递给他一杯饮料。
乔安娜的男朋友是个木工。

sentences.english: Joe and I sat on lawn chairs.
sentences.chinese: 乔和我坐在草地的椅子上。

sentences.english: I always liked you, Joe, and stood up for you, too.
sentences.chinese: 乔，我向来都喜欢你，也总是站在你一边的。

sentences.english: I think Joe is exactly the kind of player we need to improve the history of our club.
sentences.chinese: 乔正是那种我们要创造历史所需要的球员。

sentences.english: Joe sat on the bed while Martin unpacked.
sentences.chinese: 乔坐在床上，马丁打开箱子。

sentences.english: She lives upstairs, over there, next door to Joe the baby-grabber.
sentences.chinese: 她住在楼上，那边，那个“捉小孩的人”乔的隔壁。
我是乔正在抽筋的腹股沟。

sentences.english: Evidently Biddy had taught Joe to write.
sentences.chinese: 一望而知，毕蒂已经教会了乔写字。

sentences.english: Joe's girl friend really raked him over the coals for forgetting her party.
sentences.chinese: 乔由于忘记出席女朋友的聚会，被她狠狠责备了一顿。

definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
